About the Company: VXL Instruments Ltd is into the business of manufacturing terminals and Thin Client products for nearly three decades.The company is a leading global vendor of thin client devices and terminals. Its world-class products are available for a variety of OS platforms such as Go Linux, Windows CE and Window XP-Embedded as well as computing environments like the desktop, wireless, Integrated and laptop..The company also in the business segment of Spares, Service Charges, Data Processing Units.
